title: Steps To Knowledge
content:
Steps to Knowledge takes you on the journey of discovering Knowledge—the mysterious source of your inner power and authority—given to guide and protect you in life. Following this Knowledge can lead to the essential relationships needed to find and fulfill your purpose.

Steps to Knowledge provides the lessons and practices necessary for learning and living the New Message. Given in a self-study format, it contains 365 Steps (daily practices) that teach you how to see, know and act with certainty and with the guidance of the deeper intelligence within. It is the study of true self-determination and inner knowing.

Steps to Knowledge is for people who are looking to undertake a deep spiritual practice, apply this in life and perhaps make a contribution to the world at this critical turning point in our history. This book is here to serve people through this method of practice.

Steps to Knowledge is the first book of Volume 3 of The New Message.

Read the important introduction to Steps to Knowledge and discover why we are being guided to develop spiritual power in the world today.
